import React from 'react' import useFormContext from '../../Hooks/useFormContext' import DisplayInfo from './DisplayInfo' function ReviewInfo() { const { userData, commonStepFormContainerClasses, commonDisplayInfoSetClasses, optionsData } = useFormContext() const DateOfBirth = new Date(userData.dateOfBirth).toDateString().slice(4) return (
a.includes(userData.yearOfUndergrad))[0]} />
a.includes(userData.sex))[0]} /> a.includes(userData.race))[0]} />
) } export default ReviewInfo
